        Parameters:

      • formatButton

        public void formatButton(javax.swing.JButton button,
                         java.awt.Color backgroundColor,
                         java.awt.Color borderColor,
                         java.lang.String photo,
                         java.lang.String toolTip)
        Formats a JButton with a photo and tooltip. The photo is also scaled to 50, 50
        Parameters:
        button - button object to be formatted
        backgroundColor - background color
        borderColor - color of border
        photo - name of photo to be used
        toolTip - String of text to be displayed on button when mouse is hovered over it (if applicable)

      • formatTextField

        public void formatTextField(javax.swing.JTextField textField,
                            java.awt.Color backgroundColor,
                            java.awt.Color foregroundColor,
                            java.awt.Color borderColor,
                            float fontSize,
                            java.awt.Dimension size,
                            java.lang.String text)
        Formats a JTextField and only allows digits to be entered into the field
        Parameters:
        textField - text field object to be formatted
        backgroundColor - background color
        foregroundColor - color of text
        borderColor - color of the border (if applicable)
        fontSize - size of the font
        size - minimum size of the text field (if applicable)
        text - text to be displayed in the field (if applicable)

      • setGBC

        public java.awt.GridBagConstraints setGBC(java.awt.GridBagConstraints gbc,
                                          int x,
                                          int y,
                                          int w,
                                          int h,
                                          double wx,
                                          double wy,
                                          int anchor,
                                          int fill,
                                          java.awt.Insets insets)
        Applies the given parameters to the Grid Bag Constraints object to be used in a GridBagLayout for either a panel or frame
        Parameters:
        gbc - grid bag constraints object
        x - x position of element
        y - y position of element
        w - width of element
        h - height of element
        wx - relative weight for horizontal size
        wy - relative weight for vertical size
        anchor - position to set element to
        fill - int that decides to fill open space vertically and/or horizontally
        insets - Inset object that details a border around the element
        Returns:
        Returns the updated grid bag constraints object

      • setGBC

        public java.awt.GridBagConstraints setGBC(java.awt.GridBagConstraints gbc,
                                          int x,
                                          int y,
                                          int w,
                                          int h,
                                          double wx,
                                          double wy)
        Applies the given parameters to the Grid Bag Constraints object to be used in a GridBagLayout for either a panel or frame
        Parameters:
        gbc - grid bag constraints object
        x - x position of element
        y - y position of element
        w - width of element
        h - height of element
        wx - relative weight for horizontal size
        wy - relative weight for vertical size
        Returns:
        Returns the updated grid bag constraints object
